title: Activity-Based Instructional Design and Assessment Strategies for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Development and evaluation of activity-based pedagogical approaches optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Design and apply at least three activity-based instructional methods (group discussions, individual assignments, presentations, quizzes) that consider the characteristics of learning disabilities
Adjust the diversity and frequency (minimum 2 sessions/week) of activity-based instruction to evaluate its effectiveness in improving learner comprehension
Develop strategies to enhance the participation rate of students with learning disabilities in LMS and smartphone environments by at least 20%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
